info.description:
Listed on the US National Register of Historic Places since 1972, the house was built by merchant and Knoxville Mayor James Park in 1812, making it the second-oldest building in downtown Knoxville.
This is a hospital reward which sits on a 2x2 lot.  It comes with a custom foundation, making it suitable for placement in hilly areas. The stats of this hospital are basically aligned to the ingame version.
info.author: mattb325
